comments.content: "Friends" is my favorite but a bit too outdated I guess. I also find "modern family", "the office" and "how I met your mother" very helpful to English learners. Basically all sit-coms based in the setting closer to our life are good materials, thus, most si-fi or crime investigation shows are not the best choice for entry level learners.

That depends on how good is your listening and what's your purpose.

I have to say, even though my toeic is over 800, and I could chat with English ppl for hours, I don't really understand each word on "friends". haha

So, just get sth u like and enjoy it!!

first.content: how can I get toric score  out standard?  I don't understand anything is fine, doesn't matter XD ..score is important in this country！！

first.content: u see... that's quite different. To have a good Toeic score or to improve pronunciation and vocabulary capability, that's different. Why is Toeic important to you ? just people said that?  They couldn't be you, how do they know you need TOEIC or not? Are you sure Toeic is really important to your life?
